mapper.insert: INSERT INTO activity_user_prize ( `user_id`, `prize_id`, `status`, `prize_type`, `award_winning_method`, `award_winning_time`, `expire_time`, `use_time`, `handle_name`, `exchange_code`, `exchange_platform`, `shipping_status`, `tracking_number`, `shipping_time`, `receiver_name`, `receiver_phone`, `receiver_email`, `redemption_time`, `receiver_region`, `receiver_address`, `create_time`, `update_time`, `account`, `send_time`, `activity_id`, `gift_id`, `reward_id` ) VALUES ( #{userId}, 189, 1, 4, 1, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), NULL, NULL, NULL, '3.00', NULL, 1, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), #{account}, NULL, 444, NULL, 1135 );
